pkgmetadata.longdescription: ### Heybooster MongoDB Helper**Installation:**```shellpip3 install heybooster_toolkit```---**Example:**```pythonfrom heybooster.helpers.database.mongodb import MongoDBHelperNAME = "database_name"URI = "database_uri"with MongoDBHelper(uri=URI, database=NAME) as db: result = db.find_one('test_collection', query={'email': 'test@email.com'}) result = db.find('test_collection', query={'email': 'test@email.com'}) db.insert('test_collection', query={'email': 'test@email.com'}) db.insert('test_collection', query={'email': 'test@email.com'}) db.find_and_modify('test_collection', query={'email': 'test@email.com'}, update={"$set": 'test2@gmail.com'})```or```pythonfrom heybooster.helpers.database.mongodb import MongoDBHelperNAME = "database_name"URI = "database_uri"db = MongoDBHelper(uri=URI, database=NAME)result = db.find_one('test_collection', query={'email': 'test@email.com'})db.close()print(result)```
